title: The Unlikely Angel: A Novel
description: With her soft heart and angelic face, Madeline Duncan is no one's idea of a hardheaded businessman.  So when the lovely spinster comes into am unexpectedinheritance and uses her newfound wealth to start a business, she causes quite a stir...especially with Lord Cole Mandeville, who has been appointed by the courts to keep Madeline from frittering away her fortune.  Handsome, worldly, and arrogant, Cole knows just how ruthless the world can be--and that aninnocent like Miss Duncan is heading straight for heartbreak, bankruptcy, or worse.  But when he sets out to show Madeline the error of her ways, Cole is infor the surprise of his life...as he finds himself falling under the spell of a woman who won't believe the worst about anyone...even a jaded rogue like him.
author: Betina Krahn
